channel.title: Mongolian on Dulguun Gantumur
channel.description: Recent content in Mongolian on Dulguun Gantumur

item.title: Lost Mongolic Numbers
item.description: Despite Mongolian being a relatively young language family, there are a surprising amount of archaisms and innovations one can spot even in basic vocabulary such as numberals. Only with recent findings in the field these numerals’ history are beginning to be understood, along with data from neighboring languages. The biggest aid has been the deciphering of Khitan, a sister language to Mongolic, which helps reconstruct a deeper layer of Mongolic-Khitan languages (referred to also as Serbi-Mongolic).
